description: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts has 59 operational hotels in India. It has 37 hotels in the pipeline in the country, with plans to open 13 hotels this year. The chain has brands such as Ramada by Wyndham, Ramada Encore by Wyndham and Howard Johnson by Wyndham in India, and it opened its Trademark Collection hotel this week in Amritsar. Other upcoming locations for hotels include some new properties.
